    • setPowers

      public void setPowers(double drivePower, double steeringPower)
      Very basic drive method - bypasses all PID to directly control the motors. Ensure that your command has required control of all relevant subsystems before doing this, or you will be fighting the maintainers.
      Parameters:
      drivePower - -1 to 1 value for nodule wheel power
      steeringPower - -1 to 1 value for module rotation power
